skillTree.localised_description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

effects.description:
Enemy fire resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Scyla's durability has barely been tested. No battles against him last long enough. Yet, what lies dormant, gathers strength.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

skillTree.localised_description: The Chaos Wastes breed relentlessness in destruction. Many can achieve that against their opponents. Few can inflict it on whole peoples, and the lands they inhabit.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 25% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 25% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Khorne shudders with fury to hear magic incantations. But the power of a mantra in His name cannot be overstated, especially if it is the only words one knows.
"Did… did it just *speak*? Gods have mercy on us!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local region)

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Scyla cares not for the words of the ones he is supposed to be fighting alongside. But some undertake to ingratiate themselves with him nonetheless.

effects.description:
Attribute: Glorious Charge for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne and Bloodbeast of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +25 for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne and Bloodbeast of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The rest is slaughter.

effects.description: Attacks cause "Disorganised!" effect, (afflicted units lose morale and charge defence capability)

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: The Dark Gods will celebrate my blasphemous exploits.
The Blood God scorns magic. Only blood split through physical combat is acceptable to Khorne.
Blood for the Blood God!

Enemy fire resistance: -3%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -6%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: What was yours is mine now.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 4
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Khorne, and is affected by Khorne Authority.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: A brazen collar emerged from the corded muscle of Scyla’s neck during his final transformation to protect the Blood God’s favoured spawn from cowardly wizardry.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit (100)

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

	(Hero's army)
